commits.author: Steven Rowe
commits.sourceNew: /** Called before writing the term vectors of the document. * {@link #startField(FieldInfo, int, boolean, boolean)} will * be called numVectorFields times. Note that if term * vectors are enabled, this is called even if the document * has no vector fields, in this case numVectorFields * will be zero. */ public abstract void startDocument(int numVectorFields) throws IOException;
commits.sourceOld: /** Called before writing the term vectors of the document. * {@link #startField(FieldInfo, int, boolean, boolean)} will * be called numVectorFields times. Note that if term * vectors are enabled, this is called even if the document * has no vector fields, in this case numVectorFields * will be zero. */ public abstract void startDocument(int numVectorFields) throws IOException;
